# ---------menu.toml-------------
# Configure main menu and social menu
[[main]]
identifier = "home"
name = "Home"
url = "/"
    [main.params]
    icon = "home"
    newtab = true



[[social]]
identifier = "github"
name = "GitHub"
url = "https://github.com/xxxx"

[social.params]
icon = "brand-github"

[[social]]
identifier = "twitter"
name = "Twitter"
url = "https://twitter.com/xxxx"

[social.params]
icon = "brand-twitter"
